metadata.title: CVE-2022-32981 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.18.3 on powerpc32-bit platforms. There is a buffer overflow in ptrace PEEKUSER andPOKEUSER (aka PEEKUSR and POKEUSR) when accessing floating point registers.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
